symbols.name: module:sap/ui/rta/api/startKeyUserAdaptation
symbols.description:
Starts key user adaptation, initiated for an application at the passed root control instance. It subsequently extends to all valid child controls.

Example: If the whole application needs to be adapted, then this application's components container {@see sap.ui.core.ComponentContainer} should be passed as the root control to this function.

returnValue.description: Resolves when adaptation was successfully started

rootControl.name: rootControl
rootControl.description: Control instance from where key user adaptation should be started

symbols.title: function sap/ui/rta/api/startKeyUserAdaptation

symbols.name: sap.ui.rta.Client
symbols.description:
Overview

This client is used to access the sap.ui.RuntimeAuthoring instance that is running in a separate window.

Example:

sap.ui.require(['sap/ui/rta/Client'], function (RTAClient) {
    var oRTAClient = new RTAClient({
        window: ,
        origin: 
    });

    oRTAClient.getService('selection').then(function (oSelectionService) {
        oSelectionService.add('__button0').then(
            function (vResult) {
                // vResult contains response from add() function of sap.ui.rta.service.Selection
            },
            function (vError) {
                // Error that happens during the operation
            }
        );
    });
});

properties.name: origin
properties.description: Receiving window origin; a valid origin has to be specified, see https://html.spec.whatwg.org/multipage/origin.html#origin

properties.name: window
properties.description: Receiving window object; has to be a different window than the window in which this client is used

constructor.description: Accepts an object literal mSettings that defines initial property values, aggregated and associated objects as well as event handlers. See sap.ui.base.ManagedObject#constructor for a general description of the syntax of the settings object.

methods.name: destroy
methods.description: Destroys the client. After an object has been destroyed, it can no longer be used.

methods.name: sap.ui.rta.Client.extend

parameters.name: oClassInfo
parameters.description: Object literal with information about the class

parameters.name: FNMetaImpl
parameters.description: Constructor function for the metadata object; if not given, it defaults to the metadata implementation used by this class

methods.description:
Creates a new subclass of class sap.ui.rta.Client with name sClassName and enriches it with the information contained in oClassInfo.

oClassInfo might contain the same kind of information as described in sap.ui.base.ManagedObject.extend.

methods.name: sap.ui.rta.Client.getMetadata
methods.description: Returns a metadata object for class sap.ui.rta.Client.

methods.name: getOrigin
methods.description:
Gets current value of property origin.

Receiving window origin; a valid origin has to be specified, see https://html.spec.whatwg.org/multipage/origin.html#origin

methods.name: getWindow
methods.description:
Gets current value of property window.

Receiving window object; has to be a different window than the window in which this client is used

methods.name: setOrigin

returnValue.description: Reference to this in order to allow method chaining

methods.description:
Sets a new value for property origin.

Receiving window origin; a valid origin has to be specified, see https://html.spec.whatwg.org/multipage/origin.html#origin

When called with a value of null or undefined, the default value of the property will be restored.

methods.name: setWindow

returnValue.description: Reference to this in order to allow method chaining

methods.description:
Sets a new value for property window.

Receiving window object; has to be a different window than the window in which this client is used

When called with a value of null or undefined, the default value of the property will be restored.

symbols.title: class sap.ui.rta.Client

symbols.name: sap.ui.rta.service.Action
symbols.description: Provides necessary functionality to get and execute actions on controls. Actions are UI operations available in key user adaptation such as rename, remove, move etc.

methods.name: sap.ui.rta.service.Action.execute

returnValue.description: Result of the operation wrapped in a promise.

parameters.name: vControlIds
parameters.description: Control ID or an array of IDs to get actions for

parameters.name: sActionId
parameters.description: Action ID to be executed on the specified controls

methods.description: Returns a list of available actions for the specified control(s).

methods.name: sap.ui.rta.service.Action.get

returnValue.description: List of available actions wrapped in a promise

parameters.name: vControlIds
parameters.description: Control ID or an array of IDs to get actions for

methods.description:
Returns a list of available actions for the specified control(s) wrapped in a promise.

Example:

[
    {
        "id": "CTX_RENAME",
        "text": "Rename",
        "enabled": false,
        "rank": 10,
        "icon": "sap-icon://edit"
    },
    {
        "id": "CTX_ADD_ELEMENTS_AS_SIBLING",
        "text": "Add Field",
        "enabled": false,
        "rank": 20,
        "icon": "sap-icon://add",
        "group": "Add"
    },
    {
        "id": "CTX_REMOVE",
        "text": "Remove",
        "enabled": true,
        "rank": 60,
        "icon": "sap-icon://decline"
    },
    {
        "id": "CTX_CUT",
        "text": "Cut",
        "enabled": false,
        "rank": 70,
        "icon": "sap-icon://scissors"
    },
    {
        "id": "CTX_PASTE",
        "text": "Paste",
        "enabled": false,
        "rank": 80,
        "icon": "sap-icon://paste"
    }
]

nodes.name: sap.ui.rta.service.Action.ActionObject
nodes.description: Object containing the detailed information about the action.

symbols.title: namespace sap.ui.rta.service.Action

symbols.name: sap.ui.rta.service.Action.ActionObject
symbols.description:
Object containing the detailed information about the action.

{
   id: <string>, // ID of the action
   group: <string>, // Group name, in case the action has been grouped with other action(s)
   icon: <string>, // Icon name
   enabled: <boolean>, // Indicates whether the action is active and can be executed
   rank: <int>, // Sorting rank for visual representation of the action position
   text: <string>, // Action name
}

properties.name: group
properties.description: Group name in case the action has been grouped with other action(s)

properties.name: enabled
properties.description: Indicates whether the action is active and can be executed

properties.name: rank
properties.description: Sorting rank for visual representation of the action position

symbols.title: typedef sap.ui.rta.service.Action.ActionObject

methods.name: sap.ui.rta.service.ControllerExtension.add

parameters.name: sCodeRef
parameters.description: Name of the file, without path, with the extension .js. Must comply to UI5 module naming convention. Has to be unique and must not conflict with other already defined modules.

parameters.name: sViewId
parameters.description: ID of the view whose controller should be extended

methods.description: Creates a change that adds an extension to the controller associated with the given view. Throws an error if the information is not complete. As of now, this only creates the change with a reference to a file. The consumer has to take care of creating that file and adding it to the backend.

methods.name: sap.ui.rta.service.ControllerExtension.getTemplate

returnValue.description: Promise that resolves with the template as string or rejects when the file was not found

parameters.name: sViewId
parameters.description: ID of the view whose template should be retrieved

methods.description: Gets the controller extension template from the DesignTimeMetadata of the given view and returns it as a string wrapped in a promise. If there is no template specified, a default template will be returned.

symbols.name: sap.ui.rta.service.Outline
symbols.description: Provides necessary functionality to get tree model data for an outline. Takes into consideration different design time root elements.

events.name: update
events.description:
Attached listeners are notified of any modifications to existing nodes in the outline. These notifications are an array of objects (updates) whenever modifications are encountered.

The array will contain one or multiple occurrences of the following object types: 

{
  "type": "destroy",
  "element": {
     "id": <string> // elementId
  }
}

{
  "type": "editableChange",
  "element": {
     "id": <string> // elementId,
     "editable": <boolean>
  }
}

{
  "type": "new",
  "element": <sap.ui.rta.service.Outline.OutlineObject>
  "targetAggregation": <string>,
  "targetId": <string>,
  "targetIndex": <integer>
}

{
  "type": "elementPropertyChange",
  "element": <sap.ui.rta.service.Outline.OutlineObject>
  "name": <string> // property name,
  "oldValue": <string> // old value,
  "value": <integer> // current value
}

{
  "type": "move",
  "element": <sap.ui.rta.service.Outline.OutlineObject>
  "targetAggregation": <string>,
  "targetId": <string>,
  "targetIndex": <integer>
}

methods.name: sap.ui.rta.service.Outline.get

returnValue.description: Array containing outline data for each root control

parameters.name: sId
parameters.description: ID of the control to start with. If omitted the root control(s) is used.

parameters.name: iDepth
parameters.description: Depth of childNode levels that should be returned based on the given control

methods.description: Returns an outline model data associated with the key user adaptation instance, starting from the passed control. If no control is passed, the root control(s) of the respective key user adaptation instance is taken as the initial control. Throws an error if the control ID parameter is not a valid control with a stable ID.

nodes.name: sap.ui.rta.service.Outline.OutlineObject
nodes.description: Object containing an outline of available nodes.

symbols.title: namespace sap.ui.rta.service.Outline

symbols.name: sap.ui.rta.service.Outline.OutlineObject
symbols.description: Object containing an outline of available nodes.

properties.name: instanceName
properties.description: Text retrieved from node's design time metadata getLabel()

properties.name: name
properties.description: Singular name from node's design time metadata

properties.name: technicalName
properties.description: Class type for element nodes/aggregation name for aggregation nodes.

symbols.title: typedef sap.ui.rta.service.Outline.OutlineObject

symbols.name: sap.ui.rta.service.Property
symbols.description: Provides necessary functionality to retrieve design time metadata properties. Takes into consideration control metadata properties, design time metadata properties, annotations, label and name.

methods.name: sap.ui.rta.service.Property.get

returnValue.description: Object containing relevant property data for the passed control

parameters.name: sControlId
parameters.description: ID of the control to start with

methods.description:
Returns an object containing design time properties for the passed control's ID. Throws an error if the control ID parameter is not a valid control with a stable ID.

Example:

    {
       "properties": {
          "dtMetadataProperty2": {
             "value": {
                "mockKey2": "dtMetadataProperty2"
             },
             "virtual": false,
             "ignore": false
             },
          "virtualProperty1": {
             "value": "Virtual property value 1",
             "virtual": true,
             "type": "Virtual property type",
             "name": "Virtual Property Name 1",
             "ignore": false,
             "possibleValues": [
                "possibleValue1",
                "possibleValue2"
             ]
          },
          "metadataProperty1": {
             "value": "metadataPropertyValue1",
             "virtual": false,
             "type": "metadataPropertyType1",
             "name": "metadataPropertyName1",
             "ignore": false,
             "binding": {
                "parts": [
                {
                   "path": "path1",
                   "model": "model1"
                },
                {
                   "path": "path2",
                   "model": "model2"
                }
                ],
                "bindingValues": {
                   "values": "Binding Value",
                   "originalValues": "Original Binding Value"
                },
                "bindingString": "bindingString"
             }
          }
       },
       "annotations": {
          "annotation1": {
             "namespace": "com.sap.mock.vocabularies",
             "annotation": "annotation1",
             "whiteList": {
                "properties": [
                   "Property1",
                   "Property2",
                   "Property3"
                ]
             },
             "ignore": false,
             "appliesTo": [
                "Page/Button"
             ],
             "links": {
                "developer": [
                {
                   "href": "annotation1.html",
                   "text": "Annotation 1 Text 1"
                },
                {
                   "href": "annotation2.html",
                   "text": "Annotation 1 Text 2"
                }
                ]
             }
          }
       },
       "name": {
          "singular": "Singular Control Name",
          "plural": "Plural Control Name"
       },
       "label": "dt-metadata label",
       "links": {
                "developer": [
                {
                   "href": "Links.html",
                   "text": "Links Text 1"
                }
                ]
        }
    }

nodes.name: sap.ui.rta.service.Property.PropertyObject

properties.description: Properties object from design time metadata and control metadata

properties.name: label
properties.description: Label from getLabel property of design time metadata

symbols.name: sap.ui.rta.service.Selection
symbols.description: Provides functionality to get and set selection on controls.

events.name: change
events.description: Attached listeners are notified of any modifications to existing selection.

methods.name: sap.ui.rta.service.Selection.add
methods.description: Adds the specified controls to the current selection.

methods.name: sap.ui.rta.service.Selection.remove

parameters.name: vControlIds
parameters.description: Control IDs from which to remove the selection

methods.description: Removes the selection from the specified controls.

returnValue.description: true if completed successfully (false if there is nothing to reset)

methods.name: sap.ui.rta.service.Selection.set
methods.description: Deselects the current selection and selects the specified list of controls.

symbols.title: namespace sap.ui.rta.service.Selection
